description: Hi thereðŸ‘‹   This is a **Standard Calculator** [`Web Component`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Web_Components) (custom element) developed only using HTML5, CSS3, and Vanilla JS. The custom tag created for this calculator is `<my-calculator></my-calculator>`. This custom tag contains various attributes which can be modified to our liking in `index.html` file.
